## hslToRGB() function

Converts a [ColorHSL](./fast-colors.colorhsl.md) to a [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hslToRGB(hsl: ColorHSL, alpha?: number): ColorRGBA64;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hsl | [ColorHSL](./fast-colors.colorhsl.md) | the hsl color to convert |
|  alpha | number | the alpha value |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md)
